eu.id3.face

Class EyeGaze

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.id3.face.EyeGaze

  • public class EyeGaze
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a EyeGaze object of the Face module.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float leftEyeXGaze
      Value indicating the gaze alongside the x-axis of the left eye.
      float leftEyeYGaze
      Value indicating the gaze alongside the y-axis of the left eye.
      float rightEyeXGaze
      Value indicating the gaze alongside the x-axis of the right eye.
      float rightEyeYGaze
      Value indicating the gaze alongside the y-axis of the right eye.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Initializes an empty instance of the EyeGaze class.

      Initializes a new instance of the EyeGaze class by copying another EyeGaze.

      Initializes a new instance of the EyeGaze class from its members.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • leftEyeXGaze

        public float leftEyeXGaze
        Value indicating the gaze alongside the x-axis of the left eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.

      • leftEyeYGaze

        public float leftEyeYGaze
        Value indicating the gaze alongside the y-axis of the left eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.

      • rightEyeXGaze

        public float rightEyeXGaze
        Value indicating the gaze alongside the x-axis of the right eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.

      • rightEyeYGaze

        public float rightEyeYGaze
        Value indicating the gaze alongside the y-axis of the right eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EyeGaze

        public EyeGaze()
        Initializes an empty instance of the EyeGaze class.

      • EyeGaze

        public EyeGaze(float leftEyeXGaze,
               float leftEyeYGaze,
               float rightEyeXGaze,
               float rightEyeYGaze)
        Initializes a new instance of the EyeGaze class from its members.
        Parameters:
        leftEyeXGaze - Value indicating the gaze alongside the x-axis of the left eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.
        leftEyeYGaze - Value indicating the gaze alongside the y-axis of the left eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.
        rightEyeXGaze - Value indicating the gaze alongside the x-axis of the right eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.
        rightEyeYGaze - Value indicating the gaze alongside the y-axis of the right eye. Values vary in the range [-1, +1]. The maximum recommended value for an ICAO-compliant portrait is +/-0.40.

      • EyeGaze

        public EyeGaze(EyeGaze eyeGaze)
        Initializes a new instance of the EyeGaze class by copying another EyeGaze.
        Parameters:
        eyeGaze - The EyeGaze to copy.
